md:
giải nghĩa từ "istic" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* istic: suffix forming nouns and adjectives
	+ Meaning: relating to or characteristic of a particular thing or person
	+ Example: artistic (relating to art)
	+ Related words: realistic, idealistic, futuristic, ...

* istic: suffix forming nouns
	+ Meaning: a person who practices or advocates a particular thing
	+ Example: logistic (a person who deals with the organization of the movement of goods and supplies)
	+ Related words: statistic, logistic, graphic, ...

* istic: suffix forming adjectives
	+ Meaning: having a tendency or inclination towards something
	+ Example: dramatic (having a tendency to be dramatic)
	+ Related words: systematic, schematic, dogmatic, ...

* istic: suffix forming nouns and adjectives
	+ Meaning: relating to or characteristic of a particular style or manner
	+ Example: rustic (relating to or characteristic of the countryside)
	+ Related words: classic, romantic, fantastic, ...

Note: The meaning of the suffix "-istic" can vary depending on the context and the word it is attached to. The above meanings are some of the most common uses of the suffix.

Note: The meaning of the suffix "-istic" can vary depending on the context and the word it is attached to. The above meanings are some of the most common uses of the suffix.
